Akkam Pakkam Paar Song Lyrics 
Kadhalum Kadandhu Pogum 
Singer(s): Santhosh Narayanan & Mano
Music: Santhosh Narayanan

Yaeno thaano vaa
yaedhum aavaadhu.
kaado maedo po
kaanal vaaraadhu.

aahaa aahaa
oru nattam aavaadhu
aah aahaa
vatham theeraadhu.

akkam pakkam paar
ammaa appaa yaar?
suttrum muttrum paar
un sondham bandham yaar(2)
